description: Add WikiPost toggle to thread status selector.
replace:
<xf:if is="($thread.th_wikiposts_is_wikipost && $thread.canRemoveWikiPost())
		   || (!$thread.th_wikiposts_is_wikipost && $thread.canAddWikiPost())">
	<xf:option name="th_wikiposts_is_wikipost" value="1" selected="{$thread.th_wikiposts_is_wikipost}"
			   label="{{ phrase('th_wikiposts_wikipost_status') }}"
			   hint="{{ phrase('th_wikiposts_wikipost_status_hint') }}">

		<xf:afterhtml>
			<xf:hiddenval name="_xfSet[th_wikiposts_is_wikipost]" value="1" />
		</xf:afterhtml>
	</xf:option>
</xf:if>
$0
